member.name: T:Updater.ProgramInfo
member.summary: Contains application-relevant information needed for update.

member.name: P:Updater.ProgramInfo.Version
member.summary: The current version of an application, three digits, no separators, e.g. "101" (means v1.01)

member.name: P:Updater.ProgramInfo.Build
member.summary: Build date of the current application, e.g. "120908" (means 12.09.2008)

member.name: P:Updater.ProgramInfo.UpdateLocation
member.summary: Location where to find the update configuration file (builds.xml), usually the homepage. File config file is located in the sub folder "updates".

member.name: T:Updater.UpdateForm
member.summary: The form that contains a progress bar and current activity descriptions.

member.name: M:Updater.UpdateForm.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: True, wenn verwaltete Ressourcen gelöscht werden sollen; andernfalls False.

member.name: M:Updater.UpdateForm.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Erforderliche Methode für die Designerunterstützung. Der Inhalt der Methode darf nicht mit dem Code-Editor geändert werden.

member.name: M:Updater.UpdateForm.buildUpdaterExe
member.summary: Creates a temporary meta application that copies the downloaded update file to the callers application path and filename.

member.name: M:Updater.UpdateForm.client_DownloadFileCompleted(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs)
member.summary: Start copy process when the file is really closed because of executable access problems.

member.name: M:Updater.UpdateStarter.Overview(Updater.ProgramInfo)
member.summary: Shows an overview of all existing releases according to the current application.
member.param: An object filled with all necessary information

member.name: M:Updater.UpdateStarter.Update(Updater.ProgramInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks for a new version of the given module name.
member.param: An object filled with all necessary information
Used for automatic update, suppresses the "No update available" message

member.name: T:Updater.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Updater.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Updater.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Updater.OverviewForm.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Updater.OverviewForm.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.
